org.jlab.geom.detector.ftof

Class FTOFFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.geom.detector.ftof.FTOFFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Factory<FTOFDetector,FTOFSector,FTOFSuperlayer,FTOFLayer>, Showable

    public class FTOFFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements Factory<FTOFDetector,FTOFSector,FTOFSuperlayer,FTOFLayer>
    A Forward Time of Flight (FTOF) Factory.

    Factory: FTOFFactory
    Hierarchy: FTOFDetector → FTOFSector → FTOFSuperlayer → FTOFLayer → ScintillatorPaddle
